attributes.action: Stop the Primary Care Trust in Hull from buying the luxury training yacht.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This so-called training yacht is to cost approximately £500,000.00 of public money which should be used on Healthcare. 
This cost does not include yearly upkeep and maintenance which will also be at public expense.
We therefore, call on the government to stop the purchase.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
